rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Lobby/Corridor
rooms.description: Connects all major spaces on the ground floor; includes a central courtyard access.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open space with greenery and water features to promote natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A spacious guest room with a balcony overlooking the courtyard; eco-friendly insulation materials used.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Room
rooms.description: Versatile space for dining or gatherings, incorporating energy-efficient lighting and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact yet comfortable living area for domestic staff with access to the courtyard.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Energy-efficient door with high-quality insulation and natural wood finish.

openings.name: Balcony Windows
openings.description: Large windows with low-emissivity glass to promote passive solar heating and natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony offering panoramic views of the courtyard; designed with eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony oriented according to Vastu principles for tranquility and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with balcony; designed for optimal air circulation and natural light.

rooms.name: Balcony Corridor
rooms.description: Connects the three bedrooms to the central courtyard ensuring seamless outdoor access and adherence to eco-friendly design.

openings.name: Bedroom Balcony Windows
openings.description: Energy-efficient windows with solar shading options for enhanced thermal comfort.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated work space with abundant natural light and views of the surrounding greenery; designed to be eco-friendly.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for storage and utility needs with sustainable building materials and proper ventilation.

openings.name: Office Window
openings.description: Large window that maximizes daylighting while minimizing heat gain through energy-efficient glazing.

vastu_considerations.balcony_alignment: aligned with the courtyard for optimum energy flow
